name: Jetski Mini Stars: Fun Jet Ski Surfing For Kids
name_original: Jetski Mini Stars: Fun Jet Ski Surfing For Kids
description:
One of the Most addictive Jetski Stunt Racing game on AppStore!

Think you are up for this challenge?

The aim here is to finish the mission as fast as possible.

See how quickly you can do it and perform some fantastic stunts on the way!

Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running!

Features :
- Exciting
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- CRAZY jumps and loops
- Beautiful Locations
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics
